name: Battle Shooter Hero
description:
Let's play amazing adventure and action game! Your mission is shoot all enemy by touch the right or left screen.

This game is very easy to play, but very hard to get stars or pass all levels. Each level of the game will have a few shots, if you use all shoots without killing all enemy.

Play and solve all levels one by one.

Features:
=======
- Addicting game play.
- So many easy to hard levels.
- Amazing sound track.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play? Download now....
